entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:25 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -29.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kenora Airport 07:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -29.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -32.3°C
Wind: WNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:20 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:20 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
